question: Who has been appointed as the first-ever  woman Vice-Chancellor of Jamia Millia Islamia University (JMI)?
explanation: Professor Najma Akhtar has become the first-ever  woman Vice-Chancellor of Jamia Millia Islamia University (JMI) for a period of five years or until she attains the age of 70 years, She is also the first lady vice chancellor of any central university in Delhi. Ms. Akhtar has four decades of academic scholarship in educational leadership.  She is known for spearheading international educational administrators\' course for senior officials from 130 countries for more than 15 years at National Institute of Educational Planning and Administration (NIEPA) in New Delhi.
